nodes.text: One of a Kind is a short story written by Paul Danner that was originally published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 5 by West End Games in February 1995. It was made available online at Hyperspace on December 17, 2004.

Thief Sienn Sconn is passing time in the Binary Bar pondering a way to get the credits he owes his landlord for rent. Shandria L'hnnar enters the bar and sits at a table after getting a drink from the bartender. When stormtroopers arrive to arrest the rebels, Sconn assists in her escape. He manages to fight off the Imperial forces and the bounty hunter Pentix Graphyt and escorts L'hnnar to the spaceport where she is able to get to her ship and escape off-planet.
